Articles.Content:
I've been playing this game for about a week now and I can't stop!

I figured I would try my hand at submitting a unique design.

The Big Bomber.

32 Dumb Bombs

2 KSP-5 Solid

1 M-50 Liquid

1 FL-T500 tank

The bottom payload deploys first

Then the second

Sunday Punch pack

Wing+bomb

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12773495/BigBomber.craft

Too bad you didn't design it as efficient as it could be, you could of either put radial decouplers on the bombs for another set of kerboomz, or put smaller sets near the in the indentation part of the craft.

Also, I think you can edit the .cfg files in the radial decouplers to raise the detachment power of them, like how fast they break off from the main craft.

An E-800 engine, Sunday Punches large 1m fuel tank, 12 radial decouplers with bombs attached to them was my variant of this.

Made for a great manned, orbit capable ICBM, that is surprisingly stable.

Too bad you didn't design it as efficient as it could be, you could of either put radial decouplers on the bombs for another set of kerboomz, or put smaller sets near the in the indentation part of the craft.

Also, I think you can edit the .cfg files in the radial decouplers to raise the detachment power of them, like how fast they break off from the main craft.

Yeah, I wanted to put more in the middle but bombs kept clashing with the geo. Also, the bombs only attach from the side, there are no stack nodes. I may edit the cfg later, This time I just wanted to use them as they were designed

My guess is you would enter orbit, refine the orbital plane until you pass over where you want to hit, do a partial orbit and begin to deorbit on a path towards your target, and release the bombs.

If you used the C7 pack, you could put a plane at the top so you could fly away to safety afterwards!
